TextLibrary.Text: Lord Bane
So here you are at last. You have traveled a long way, mortal. You are very, very persistent.
So here you are at last. You have traveled a long way, mortal. You are very, very persistent.
So here you are at last. You have traveled a long way, mortal. You are very, very persistent.
So here you are at last. You have traveled a long way, mortal. You are very, very persistent.
This is where you probably expect me to give you the chance to withdraw your forces. But I'll pass. I think we all know how that conversation would go.

This is where you probably expect me to give you the chance to withdraw your forces. But I'll pass. I think we all know how that conversation would go.
YOU would offer ME a chance to surrender? How about if I make YOU an offer instead?
YOU would offer ME a chance to surrender? How about if I make YOU an offer instead?
YOU would offer ME a chance to surrender? How about if I make YOU an offer instead?
YOU would offer ME a chance to surrender? How about if I make YOU an offer instead?
What are you talking about?
What are you talking about?
What are you talking about?
What are you talking about?
Follow your sword, mortal. Follow the sword you were given by my servant Lord Moarg and see where it leads you. I think you will be... pleasantly surprised.
